LandingHero.title: Create Beautiful Forms in Minutes
LandingHero.subtitle: GoForms helps you create, share, and analyze forms with ease. Start for free and upgrade as you grow.

LandingFeatures.title: Features
LandingFeatures.feature1Description: Beautiful interface for easy form creation and collaboration.
LandingFeatures.feature2Description: Get statistics and the insights you need from the responses you get.
LandingFeatures.feature3Description: Send forms in a easy way. Share them with your team or with your customers.

LandingCta.title: Ready to Create Amazing Forms?
LandingCta.subtitle: Join thousands of satisfied users and start creating forms today.

AdminPanel.title: Admin Panel
AdminPanel.description: Manage quickly any users and forms.

NoForms.title: No Forms Found
NoForms.description: There are currently no forms. Create one or use a template

MainOrCreateForm.formQuestionDescriptionPlaceholder: Enter a small description for this question
MainOrCreateForm.formEmptyFormDescription: This form currently has no fields. Click the button below to add fields to this form.
MainOrCreateForm.formEmptyFormDescription2: No fields are available in this form.

DeleteDialog.title: Are you sure?
DeleteDialog.description: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete

Form.disclaimer: Disclaimer: You can only make direct changes if you are an admin. Toggle edition mode in the top right corner to make changes.

UploadsTab.noUploadsDescription: Make sure to add a file upload question to the form or wait for users to submit the form.

SendForm.toastQrError: Web Share is not supported in your browser

BlockedUser.title: Restricted Access
BlockedUser.description: Your account has been blocked. Please contact your administrator for more information.
